Not to long ago, I had an amazing opportunity because of Nick. He really took the time to help me find the best fit. He gave me pointers, educated me, and had great open communication.  He really took the time to understand just what type of position I was looking for. He helped me prep for my interviews, helped to make resume more presentable, and did mock interviews with me to prep.  It was such a pleasure to work with him because he was easy to talk to and very personable. His personality didn't make this feel a difficult process. He is the type of person, who not only wasn't to help you find a good position, but you naturally end up bettering yourself because of him.  I hope to work with Nick in the near future again!!!!

Mobile Application Architect/Developer
May 10, 2015, Robert was a client of Nicholas’

There have been hardly any recruiters that have earned my trust and respect, but Nicholas has earned both from me.  He is one of the few people that I have met who is truly genuine, honest, caring, and hard working.  He actually cares about you and wants you to be happy and successful rather than trying to force you into a position that may not be right for you. I truly do appreciate that Nicholas has always been up front and truthful with me.  He went beyond what was expected of him and did everything he could to solve any issues that arose to ensure that I was comfortable with whatever decision I made.  I have honestly never had a more pleasant experience working with a recruiter before.

Tasha is incredible at everything she puts her mind to. She is extremely meticulous and she only knows how to do things to the best of her abilities, Her drive and passion for her work is second to none. No challenge is to big for her and even if you ever think she can't handle it, she will find a way to amaze you. You never have to ask her to do anything, she is always ready help.Tasha is a machine, she does the job of four people.Tasha is not just a hard worker, but she is one of the most fun and enjoyable people to be around. She has a wonderful sense of humor and she makes a room brighter when she is in it. She is very kind and caring of others. If you have a chance to work with her, take that opportunity. You won't regret it.

summary: As a Sr. Account Executive and Sr. Technical Recruiter, I get the privilege to work with the top IT professionals in their respected fields. I strive to build strong relationships/partnerships and continue working with leading individuals in today’s market. My mission is to deliver industry leading professionals/solutions to clients for both Temporary and Permanent opportunities. While, also delivering a unique experience for my candidates to ensure that they will seek out my services when they are ready to make their next career move.Business Specialties: Networking, Relationship Building, Talent Acquisition, Recruiting, Business Development, Account Management, and Candidate to Client MatchingTechnology Specialties: IT Directors/Management, Project Managers, Business/Systems Analyst, Network Engineers, Network Administrators, SAP/ERP, Developers: iOS, Android,Java, .Net, Web/UI/UX, Database Engineers/Administrators: .NET/C#, C++, Oracle, SQL, MySQL, and DB2
